It’s heartwarming, you know?\""},{"lineNumber":106640,"originalJapaneseLine":"朝、ランスはカーテンが開く音で目が覚めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"In the morning, Lance woke up to the sound of curtains being drawn."},{"lineNumber":106641,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んん……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...?\""},{"lineNumber":106642,"originalJapaneseLine":"柔らかな朝の光で瞼が温められ、","translatedEnglishLine":"His eyelids warmed by the soft morning light,"},{"lineNumber":106643,"originalJapaneseLine":"徐々にランスの頭が覚醒していく。","translatedEnglishLine":"gradually, Lance’s mind awakened."},{"lineNumber":106644,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……むう、シィルか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Mmm, is that Seera?\""},{"lineNumber":106645,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おはようございます、御主人様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good morning, Master.\""},{"lineNumber":106646,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ？　なんでビスケッタさん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Why’s Biscetta here?\""},{"lineNumber":106647,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィルかと思ったぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought it was Seera.\""},{"lineNumber":106648,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、御主人様のお世話は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, taking care of Master"},{"lineNumber":106649,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほぼ全てシィル様にお任せしていますが、","translatedEnglishLine":"is almost entirely entrusted to Lady Seera,"},{"lineNumber":106650,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本日はシィル様がお風邪を召されています」","translatedEnglishLine":"but today, Lady Seera has caught a cold.\""},{"lineNumber":106651,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その為、本日は代わりに私が、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Therefore, today I will be the one,"},{"lineNumber":106652,"originalJapaneseLine":"　不肖ながら御主人様のお世話を","translatedEnglishLine":"unworthy as I am, to take care of Master."},{"lineNumber":106653,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー……そか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... I see.\""},{"lineNumber":106654,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ビスケッタさんのお世話なんて久しぶりだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's been a while since Biscetta took care of me."},{"lineNumber":106655,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シィルが氷から出てきて以来、","translatedEnglishLine":"Since Seera came out of the ice,"},{"lineNumber":106656,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ずっとシィルの世話しか受けてなかったから","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ve only been cared for by Seera.\""},{"lineNumber":106657,"originalJapaneseLine":"「御主人様に満足して頂けるか分かりませんが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don’t know if I can satisfy Master..."},{"lineNumber":106658,"originalJapaneseLine":"　できる限りのことをさせて頂きます」","translatedEnglishLine":"but I will do everything I can.\""},{"lineNumber":106659,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、ビスケッタさんの世話で","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, is there anything unsatisfactory about being taken care of by Biscetta?\""},{"lineNumber":106660,"originalJapaneseLine":"　満足できないことなどあるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is there anything like that?\""},{"lineNumber":106661,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっし、まずは朝風呂に入るぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, first I’ll take a morning bath."},{"lineNumber":106662,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ビスケッタさん、ついてこい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Biscetta, come with me.\""},{"lineNumber":106663,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、かしこまりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, at your command.\""},{"lineNumber":106664,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぷはー、いいお湯だった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew, that was a nice bath.\""},{"lineNumber":106665,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがびちょびちょのまま、部屋を歩き、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance walked around the room soaking wet,"},{"lineNumber":106666,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビスケッタがすかさず体を拭いていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Biscetta quickly started to dry him off."},{"lineNumber":106667,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この後は朝飯だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Next is breakfast."},{"lineNumber":106668,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日のメニューはなんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What’s on the menu today?\""},{"lineNumber":106669,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今朝はビフィズス菌の天ぷらです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This morning we have tempura of Bifidobacteria."},{"lineNumber":106670,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それとピョンピョン草のサラダに、","translatedEnglishLine":"And a salad of Pyonpyon grass,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供好きだな、さては……）
「しかしなあ……うーむ……」
「なんのお話〜？」
いつからいたのかリセットが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset had somehow been there all along,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドに身を乗り出していた。
「んじゃ、笑顔の天才を師匠につけてやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, I'll assign you a master who's a genius at smiling."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んえー？」
ランスがリセットの頭にポンと手を置いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance gently placed his hand on Reset's head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……こうですか？」
リセットがビスケッタの頬を
両手でうにっと上向きにする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and with both hands, gently pushed them upwards.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、時折ビスケッタがリセットに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterwards, from time to time, Biscetta would receive from Reset

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 笑顔の師事を受けている光景が
ランス城では見られるようになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a scene that could now be seen at Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ、心臓に悪いの私だけかしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh, am I the only one whose heart doesn't like this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え〜、ほのぼのですよ？」
朝、ランスはカーテンが開く音で目が覚めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the morning, Lance woke up to the sound of curtains being drawn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 柔らかな朝の光で瞼が温められ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His eyelids warmed by the soft morning light,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徐々にランスの頭が覚醒していく。
「……むう、シィルか？」
「おはようございます、御主人様」
「あれ？　なんでビスケッタさん？」
「シィルかと思ったぞ」
「はい、御主人様のお世話は、
ほぼ全てシィル様にお任せしていますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is almost entirely entrusted to Lady Seera,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本日はシィル様がお風邪を召されています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but today, Lady Seera has caught a cold."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その為、本日は代わりに私が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Therefore, today I will be the one,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不肖ながら御主人様のお世話を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: unworthy as I am, to take care of Master.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー……そか」
「ビスケッタさんのお世話なんて久しぶりだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's been a while since Biscetta took care of me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが氷から出てきて以来、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Seera came out of the ice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっとシィルの世話しか受けてなかったから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve only been cared for by Seera."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「御主人様に満足して頂けるか分かりませんが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don’t know if I can satisfy Master...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: できる限りのことをさせて頂きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I will do everything I can."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、ビスケッタさんの世話で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, is there anything unsatisfactory about being taken care of by Biscetta?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満足できないことなどあるか」
「うっし、まずは朝風呂に入るぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, first I’ll take a morning bath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさん、ついてこい」
「はい、かしこまりました」
「ぷはー、いいお湯だった」
ランスがびちょびちょのまま、部屋を歩き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance walked around the room soaking wet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタがすかさず体を拭いていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Biscetta quickly started to dry him off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この後は朝飯だな。
今日のメニューはなんだ？」
「今朝はビフィズス菌の天ぷらです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This morning we have tempura of Bifidobacteria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとピョンピョン草のサラダに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And a salad of Pyonpyon grass,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
